channel.title: Cloudflare's API on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Cloudflare's API on Security365 Docs

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description: Troubleshooting API tokens and keys ​​ The token is not verified Ensure the token has been verified by running the following curl command and confirming that the response returns "status": "active". curl "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/user/tokens/verify" \ -H "Authorization: Bearer <API_TOKEN" { "success": true, "errors": [], "messages": [], "result": { "id": "f267e341f3dd4697bd3b9f71dd96247f", "status": "active", "not_before": "2018-07-01T05:20:00Z", "expires_on": "2020-01-01T00:00:00Z" } } ​​ The token has incorrect permissions Review the permissions groups for your token in the Cloudflare dashboard External link icon Open external link .

item.title: Licenses
item.description: All documentation in the Cloudflare Workers documentation website, including reference documentation and tutorials, are licensed under the CC-BY-SA 4.0 External link icon Open external link license. Any contributions to the GitHub repository External link icon Open external link for this project will be licensed under CC-BY-SA 4.0: thanks for your contributions! Code contributions, such as snippets in the Template Gallery and the code that serves this website via Cloudflare Workers, are licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.
